data.message: If this is a public forum why then are we not allowed th contact the public. Please let me know what I have done wrong and ghow I have upset these people. You have my word that I will not contact any of these people as some of them are relatives but I can't remember all the names. Please help me ubderstand this whole situation. You are welcome th check with any of my other friends and neighbours as to the type of person I am. God Bless :-) <3 I allways sign off that way but never push God's word at antbody Thanks for your understanding
